hints.label: lem-kinetic-energy-bound
hints.title: Kinetic Energy Control
hints.content:
4250: :label: lem-kinetic-energy-bound
4251: 
4252: The kinetic energy is controlled by the velocity Fisher information and KL divergence:
4253: 
4254: $$
4255: E_v[\rho] \le E_v[\rho_\infty] + C_v D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \rho_\infty) + \frac{C_v'}{\gamma} I_v(\rho)
4256: 
4257: $$
hints.raw_directive:
4247: **Lemma (Kinetic energy bound)**:
4248: 
4249: :::{prf:lemma} Kinetic Energy Control
4250: :label: lem-kinetic-energy-bound
4251: 
4252: The kinetic energy is controlled by the velocity Fisher information and KL divergence:
4253: 
4254: $$
4255: E_v[\rho] \le E_v[\rho_\infty] + C_v D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \rho_\infty) + \frac{C_v'}{\gamma} I_v(\rho)
4256: 
4257: $$
4258:
